verses.content: Ka lungril hi thil ṭhain a liem zar zar a; Laltak chungchâng thuha ka thil phuok chu ka hril ding a nih: Ka lei hi lekhaziek thiemtak kawlawm a nih.
Mihriem nauhai nêk hin i hmêl a ṭha lem a, Lunginsietna hi i hmûra chun buok a nih; Chuleiin, Pathienin kumkhuoa dingin mal a sâwm che a nih.
Aw mi hrât, i kâwlhnâm i kâwngah vawng rawh. I ropuina le i mawina leh.
Thutak le thuhnuoirawlna le felna leiin, I mawina inbelin, aitluongtakin sakawr chunga chuongin fe pei rawh. Chuongchun, i kut changtieng chun thil râpthlâktakhai ân chûktir ding che a nih.
I thal chu ân zum a, Laltak dotuhai lungkhura chun ân bûr zing a, Mi tin chu i hnuoiah an tlu hlak a.
Aw Pathien, i lalṭhungpha chu chatuonin a um ding a nih, Thlierbîkna nei lona lalhmawl chu i ram lalhmawl chu a nih.
Felna chu i ngainah a, rîtlona chu i theida kha; Chuleiin, Pathien, i Pathien chun i ruolhai nêka nasain, Hlimna hriek a nâl ta che hi.
I silfên po po chu murra rim dâm, aloe rim dâm, thing- zungthak rim dâm ân nam rum rum a; Saihaa siem lal inhaia ṭingṭang chi tum tum ri hung suokhai chun a sukhlim che a ni hi.
I nuhmei ṭhahai laia chun lalhai naunuhai an ṭhang veh a, I changtieng chun Ophir rângkachaka incheiin lalnu chu a ngîr a.
Aw ka naunu, ngai la, ngaituo la, na sit rawh; I mihai le i pa ina mihai chu theinghil rawh;
Chuongchun, laltakin i hmêl ṭhatak hi a dit ding annâwm, Ama chu i Lalpa a ni sih a; chuongchun, ama chu chibai bûk hlak rawh.
Tura naunu chu thilpêk chawi- in chutaka chun um a ta, Mi laia hausahai ngei chun i ditsakna hung ngên an tih.
Lal in sûnga lal naunu chu a ropui vêl vawng a, A silfên chu rângkachaka ṭiel mawi a nih.
Puon ṭhui mawi silin laltak kuomah ṭhuoi an ta, Ama zuitu nunghâk a ruolhai chu, I kuomah ṭhuoi an tih.
Lâwmtak le hlimtakin ṭhuoi an ta, Laltak ina chun lût an tih.
I pahai aiah i nauhai um an ta, Anni chu hnuoi chung po poa hin milienah siem i tih.
I hming hi suon po poa hriet zing dingin siem ka ta, Chuleiin, mi tinin kumkhaw- tluongin lâwmthu hril an tih.
